participant_1.background:
I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings.
I'm not a good cook, but I do enjoy making Christmas dinner for my family.
I drive a pickup truck because it's perfect for hauling my skydiving gear and going off-road.
i enjoy dressing up to go out clubbing.
I drive a Jeep Wrangler because it is a rugged vehicle that is perfect for my hobbies.

participant_2.background:
My weight is irrelevant.
i go fishing on the weekends to relax.
I practice martial arts regularly to stay in shape and defend myself.
i am twenty one years old.
i like to fish.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! How are you today?
I am doing great! I am excited to go fishing this weekend.
That sounds like fun! Where are you going fishing?
I am going to go fishing in the mountains.
That sounds like a beautiful place to go fishing. I hope you catch a lot of fish!
Thank you! I hope I do too. I have been practicing my fishing skills in the backyard.
That is great! I am sure you will be able to catch a lot of fish.
I hope so! I am really excited to go fishing.
I am sure you will have a great time.
Thank you! I hope so.
What do you like to do when you are not fishing?
I like to go skydiving, go clubbing, and cook.
That sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies.
I do! I try to keep myself busy.
It sounds like you do! I am sure you have a lot of interesting stories to tell.
I do! I would love to tell you some of them sometime.
I would love to hear them!
Maybe we could meet up sometime and I could tell you some of my stories?
That sounds like fun! I would love to meet up with you.
Great! I will send you a message and we can figure out a time to meet up.
Sounds good! I look forward to it!
